overview: A year shooting some of the best highliners looking for the purest lines in the Pyrénées mountains. A quest of balance with life in society, work and passions. With Pyrénaline, Catliners, Skyliners, .... Featuring Gautier bourgard, Ramon Maeso, Laure & Julien Millot, Alexander Schulz and many more crazy people...
title: Hanging by a Thread
